pages.title: Lemon Shark
pages.text: Lemon sharks can grow to 3.4 metres ($(o)11 ft$()) in length.$(br2)They are often found in shallow subtropical waters and are known to inhabit and return to specific nursery sites for breeding.$(br2)Often feeding at night, these sharks use electroreceptors to find their main source of prey: fish.

pages.title: Lemon Shark
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★☆☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: untamedwilds:chum$(br2)Number of Offspring: 3$(br2)Growth time: 7 Days
